about_the_game:
The official port of the Kudamono Drop mobile game to PC!

Kudamono Drop is a game all about catching fruit! Slide your basket left and right as the fruits fall from the top of the screen. Catch as many small fruits as you can, but be careful! There are larger fruits that can't fit in your basket, so try to avoid them.

Main Features

Play Through 100 Levels
Experience 100 unique levels, all with different gimmicks. There's even a boss battle at the end! Complete each level without getting hit to get a PERFECT score. You might even unlock something special if you get PERFECT in all levels.





Endless Mode and Banana Bonanza
Compete for the highest scores in Endless Mode! You can choose to play Endless Mode with no gimmicks, or with gimmicks (like the main levels). There is also an optional Hardcore setting. This lets you only have one heart, so be extra careful not to hit any large fruit!

In Banana Bonanza mode, collect as many bananas as you can before the time runs out. You can pick up blue clocks to increase your remaining time by 5, or gold clocks to increase it by 10.



Many Customization Options
Collect coins throughout the game and use them in the shop to purchase various cosmetics. Decorate your basket by changing the color, adding accessories and patterns! You can also buy upgrades, even increasing your basket's health points!





Additional Enhancements
This enhanced PC release of Kudamono Drop also comes with some extra goodies that weren't in the mobile release!
  • Widescreen 1080p support
  • Full keyboard and controller support
  • Better particles and visual effects
  • Better UI animations
  • Screen wrapping mechanic (keyboard and controller play only)


The Game Also Has...
  • Many different fruit drawn in a kawaii style!
  • Addictive gameplay!
  • Music in a kawaii EDM style!
  • Day and Night themes, with corresponding music tracks!
  • Achievements!
  • Full offline play!
  • English and Japanese language support!

name: Kudamono Drop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

short_description: Kudamono Drop is an arcade game all about catching fruit to get the highest scores possible!
